pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 7, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 7, 2017:

Hamburg, Germany

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Chancellor of Germany, Angela Merkel.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 Leaders Retreat.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the G20 family photo.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Luncheon – Working Session I.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Session II.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of India, Narendra Modi.

Hamburg Messe

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive at the Elbphilharmonie.

Elbphilharmonie

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend a G20 reception given by the Chancellor of Germany.

Elbphilharmonie

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend a concert at the Elbphilharmonie.

Elbphilharmonie

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend a dinner given by the Chancellor of Germany.

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only


Note: all times local
